citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:01 PM on
6/11/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, calling phone numbers on file and
leaving messages, and leaving a text message. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Mark Sanderbeck, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat

leaving messages, and leaving a text message. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Mark Sanderbeck, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
